author: The Linux Foundation
description:
In December 2024, leaders from around the globe gathered in Beijing for a groundbreaking event hosted by the Adam Foundation with support from the Linux Foundation.

💡 Open source isn’t just about code—it’s about people, purpose, and building a better digital world.

📖 Dive into the full report for more insights: hubs.la/Q032sJC70

title: 🌍 Open Source Congress 2024: Where innovation meets collaboration!
